Many of the procedures to be followed by the LPG gas delivery persons,are not followed. Loose seals, cylinders not containing the exact weight of LPG,(even Commercial cylinders), compulsory demand for "tips" when all they do is to unload the LPG cylinders in front of the gate. The consumer is forced to transport the cylinder/s from the gate to the point of use. This is a big scam,considering that all consumers are asked for "tips" and many of them pay extra so that they get proper service.
